title: Regarding PESSAT AND CET
content:
Paid pessat seat fees 4.5 lakhs now if I get seat I know that they'll refund

But I had heard they'll refund if u account only in their branch I guess 
Union Bank of India 

Will they not refund if we have account in other banks?

comments.body:
Nothing like that. 

Speaking from experience: 

* They **will refund the entire Pessat fees (4+ Lkh)** once you get a seat through KCET
* Only for 1st year you dont have to pay your fees to PES, only have to pay to KCET.
* 2nd year onwards you have to directly pay to PES.
* They will also send a email saying if you want to avail scholarship you have to pay additional 10k 
* UBI account is needed only for scholarships 
* for other miscellaneous transactions you can do via UPI/Neft/Credit or Debit Card
* Refunds again depends on the management. sometimes it will be done to the same card/account as the initial transaction.
